summary: A test suite that validates the parsing and handling of WPA-related fields in 802.11 frames, covering WPA detection, extended IV handling, key identifier extraction, WEP seed generation, traffic sequence counters, payload data, message integrity code, and ICV retrieval.
business_intent: To ensure the WPA data processing component correctly interprets security parameters and maintains data integrity, supporting reliable Wiâ€‘Fi authentication and encryption.
